sprites.capability

Interface Destroyable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BiggerBombsPowerUp, BreakableWall, DoublePointsPowerUp, InfiniteBombsPowerUp, Mob, Player

    public interface Destroyable

    Darin Huang
